## load in data

## Problem 1
#### Filling missing values 
```{r}
mean_function = function(x){
    
    if (is.numeric(x)) {
      x = replace_na(x,mean(x[!is.na(x)]))
    }else if (is.character(x)) {
      x = replace_na(x, "virginica")
    }
}
  
new_dataset = map_df( iris_with_missing, mean_function)
```


## Problem 2
#### Dataframe with all file names

```{r}
dataframe = list.files("./data")
```

#### Tidy dataframe for all files. 

```{r}
data_function = function(z){
    
  read_csv(file = str_c("./data/", z))
  
}

data_list = map(dataframe, data_function)

all_data = map_df(dataframe, data_function) %>% 
mutate(
  Participant = dataframe 
) %>% 
select(Participant, everything()) %>% 
separate(Participant, into = c("arm", "id"), sep = "_") %>% 
mutate(
   arm = recode(arm, `con` = "control", `exp` = "experiment"),
   id = str_replace(id, ".csv$", ""),
) 

tidy_dataset = 
  pivot_longer(
    all_data,
    week_1:week_8,
    names_to = "week",
    values_to = "data"
  ) %>% 
mutate(
  week = str_replace(week, "week_", "")
)

```
